alert.note: Alert for Boone; Logan; McDowell; Mingo; Northwest Raleigh; Wyoming (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:24PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Buchanan, McDowell, southeastern Mingo, northwestern Raleigh, southeastern Logan, Wyoming and southeastern Boone Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 721 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong line of thunderstorms from just north of Man to near Grundy moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Welch, Grundy, Pineville, Davenport, Mullens, Oceana, Gary, War, Man, Northfork, Gilbert Creek, Mallory, Hinch, Hanover, R.d. Bailey Lake, Bald Knob, Amherstdale-Robinette, Twin Falls State Park, Big Rock and Wharton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Logan; McDowell; Mingo; Northwest Raleigh; Wyoming
